<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">[Swamp of Sloth](/Spells.aspx?ID=516)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Olfactory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=246" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 405 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Bloodline**
[Demonic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action to Three Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 5-foot burst or more

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Ground in the area turns swampy and fetid. The area is difficult terrain. The sludge at the bottom of the morass animates into diminutive sludge beasts that have a demonic appearance. These don't function as normal creatures, but they swarm over creatures in the swamp and exude a noxious stench. The swamp deals 1d6 poison damage; creatures that end their turn in the area must attempt a basic Fortitude save. You can increase the number of actions it takes to Cast the Spell. For each additional action, increase the burst's radius by 5 feet.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The damage increases by 1d6, and the initial radius increases by 5 feet.
name: Swamp of Sloth
